string.value: Umi of Showa Town sounds like she's stuck in a tough spot. I should go talk to her.

She said she needed a solid rock to help her make spice vegetables. A solid rock...speaking of which, I remember hearing that #b#o6400100##k the monster collects them. \n#t04000131# #b#c04000131##k/80
Umi's spiced vegetables sure sound enticing. I should go get some later~!
We have the freshest cabbages you can find! Well, I'm trying to spice up these vegetables...

Of course, we sell them here. The problem is, I can't find the solid rock necessary to make these spiced vegetables. I tried finding those the other day at a beach, but I could only find small, useless ones. Even when I found the big ones, they were too heavy for my bad back. Granny has a hard time carrying those, you know. Sigh~
If you got some time, how about helping me find those rocks? I'll pay you well.
Good luck, and don't get hurt!
Oh no!! Who should I ask then?
Did you find a solid rock?
This should definitely do. Here's your pay. Thank you!
